description:
For some inexplicable reason, Jahy-sama ends up having to introduce Kyouko to Druj.
While she is thrilled to hear about the revival of the Demon Lord, Druj cannot stand that Kyouko is sitting next to Jahy-sama. She is supposed to be underling Number 1!
Kyouko on the other hand maintains that she is Jahy-sama`s friend, which only fans Druj`s flames. Things escalate.
Meanwhile, the Demon Lord was repeating the cycle of eating and sleeping at Kyouko`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le roi démon ne sait pas s`arrêter !
The Dark Lord Doesn`t Hold Back!
